title: Answers for Alexander Hamiltoun of Kinkel, to the petition given in be way of answer, for John Ayttoun of Kinaldy against him.
author: Hamilton, Alexander, of Kinkel, fl. 1695.
notes: In response to: Aytoun, John. Unto His Grace, His Majesties High Commissioner, and the Right Honourable the Estates of Parliament the petition of John Aytoun of Kinnaldie.
Imperfect: creased with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
